td.content: s:patient with moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he has had several such episodes over past 6 months. he is a M accountant aged 36 years. patient reports that he smokes once or twice daily denies any alcohol use o:Height 166 cm, Weight 59.8 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

content2.Unmatched: patient reports that he smokes once or twice daily denies any alcohol use

td.content: s:pt with moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. he has had several such episodes over past 2 years. pt is a white m aged 36 ys. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 165 cm, Weight 59.5 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:pt presents with moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments, moderate pain and discharge in ear x 4 weeks. patient also reports chronic moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. he is a 36 yo male. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 60 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:pt presents with moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. he has history of moderate pain and discharge in ear. he is a 36 yo M. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 60.5 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
